semantics.tolerancepair

Class SearchMinTolerancePairCreator

  • Object
    • TolerancePairCreator
      • SearchTolerancePairCreator
        • SearchMinTolerancePairCreator

  • public class SearchMinTolerancePairCreator
extends SearchTolerancePairCreator
    Backtracking-Search approach to create minimal tolerance-pairs. A search tree is explored to find all minimal tolerance-pairs. This creator does not give progress information.
    Author:
    Tobias Falke
